fields.Name: Autotag and Vectorize Content
fields.Description: Autotag Content and create vectors of the content items that are created.

fields.Name: Autotag
fields.Description: A bit, to indicate if we autotag or not. 1 indicates we should autotag, 0 we should not

fields.Name: Vectorize
fields.Description: A bit to indicate if we vectorize the content items or not. 1 indicates we should vectorize, 0 we should not

fields.Name: EntityNames
fields.Description: Name of the entity to vectorize
Content items successfully autotagged and vectorized
Failed to autotag or vectorize content items

fields.Name: Vectorize Entity
fields.Description: Action that vectorizes entities by creating and storing vector embeddings for entity documents.

fields.Name: EntityNames
fields.Description: Names of entities to vectorize. Can be a single entity name, comma-separated list, or array of entity names
All entities were successfully vectorized
One or more entities failed to vectorize

fields.Name: Run External Change Detection
fields.Description: Executes the External Change Detection process to identify changes in data that bypassed MemberJunction.

fields.Name: EntityList
fields.Description: A comma separated list of entity names to detect changes for. If not provided, all eligible entities will be processed
Changes detected and replayed successfully
Failed to detect changes or failed to replay changes

fields.Name: Send Single Message
fields.Description: Sends a single message via the MJ Communication Framework

fields.Name: Subject
fields.Description: The subject of the message

fields.Name: Body
fields.Description: The body of the message

fields.Name: To
fields.Description: The recipient of the message

fields.Name: From
fields.Description: The sender of the message

fields.Name: Provider
fields.Description: The name of the Communication Provider to use to send the message

fields.Name: MessageType
fields.Description: The name of the Message Type (within the provider) to use to send the message
Message sent successfully via the communication provider
Failed to send message - check provider configuration and message parameters

fields.Name: Get Weather
fields.Description: Retrieves current weather information for a specified location using free public weather APIs

fields.Name: Location
fields.Description: City name or location to get weather for (e.g., 'New York', 'London'). **JUST CITY NAME, NO STATE OR COUNTRY** Either this or Latitude/Longitude must be provided

fields.Name: Latitude
fields.Description: Latitude coordinate for weather lookup. Must be used with Longitude parameter

fields.Name: Longitude
fields.Description: Longitude coordinate for weather lookup. Must be used with Latitude parameter
Weather data retrieved successfully
The specified location could not be found
Either Location or both Latitude and Longitude parameters are required
Failed to retrieve weather data due to API error

fields.Name: Get Stock Price
fields.Description: Retrieves current stock price and related information for a specified ticker symbol

fields.Name: Ticker
fields.Description: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL)
Stock data retrieved successfully
The specified ticker symbol is invalid or not found
Ticker parameter is required
Failed to retrieve stock data due to API error

fields.Name: Calculate Expression
fields.Description: Evaluates mathematical expressions supporting basic arithmetic, parentheses, and common math functions

fields.Name: Expression
fields.Description: Mathematical expression to evaluate (e.g., '(2*3)+4/15', 'sqrt(16)+pow(2,3)')
Expression calculated successfully
The expression is invalid or contains unsafe code
Expression parameter is required

fields.Name: Color Converter
fields.Description: Converts colors between different formats (HEX, RGB, HSL, HSV) and provides color analysis

fields.Name: Color
fields.Description: Color in HEX (#RGB or #RRGGBB), RGB (rgb(r,g,b)), HSL (hsl(h,s%,l%)), or color name format
Color converted successfully
The color format is not recognized or invalid
Color values are out of valid range
Color parameter is required
Failed to convert color

fields.Name: Text Analyzer
fields.Description: Analyzes text content providing statistics, readability scores, and word frequency analysis

fields.Name: Text
fields.Description: The text content to analyze

fields.Name: IncludeWordFrequency
fields.Description: Boolean flag to include word frequency analysis in results
Text analyzed successfully
Text parameter is required
Failed to analyze text

fields.Name: Unit Converter
fields.Description: Converts values between different units of measurement including length, weight, temperature, volume, area, speed, and time

fields.Name: Value
fields.Description: The numeric value to convert

fields.Name: FromUnit
fields.Description: The unit to convert from (e.g., 'miles', 'kg', 'celsius')

fields.Name: ToUnit
fields.Description: The unit to convert to (e.g., 'kilometers', 'pounds', 'fahrenheit')
Unit conversion completed successfully
Value, FromUnit, and ToUnit parameters are required
Value must be a valid number
One or more units are not recognized
Cannot convert between different unit categories
Failed to convert units

fields.Name: Business Days Calculator
fields.Description: Calculates business days between dates, accounting for weekends and holidays. Can add/subtract business days from a date

fields.Name: Operation
fields.Description: Operation to perform: 'DaysBetween', 'AddDays', or 'SubtractDays'

fields.Name: StartDate
fields.Description: Starting date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

fields.Name: EndDate
fields.Description: Ending date (for DaysBetween operation, YYYY-MM-DD format)

fields.Name: Days
fields.Description: Number of business days to add/subtract (for AddDays/SubtractDays operations)

fields.Name: ExcludeHolidays
fields.Description: Boolean to exclude holidays (default: true)

fields.Name: Country
fields.Description: Country code for holiday calendar (default: 'US')
Business days calculated successfully
Required parameters are missing
Invalid date format provided
Invalid value provided for Days parameter
Invalid operation specified
Failed to calculate business days

fields.Name: IP Geolocation
fields.Description: Retrieves geolocation information for an IP address including location, timezone, ISP, and privacy indicators

fields.Name: IPAddress
fields.Description: The IP address to lookup (optional - uses caller's IP if not provided)
Geolocation data retrieved successfully
Invalid IP address format
Failed to retrieve geolocation data
Failed to get IP geolocation

fields.Name: Census Data Lookup
fields.Description: Retrieves US Census demographic and economic data for a given ZIP code or city/state location

fields.Name: ZipCode
fields.Description: ZIP code to lookup (either this or City/State required)

fields.Name: City
fields.Description: City name (must be used with State)

fields.Name: State
fields.Description: State name or abbreviation (must be used with City)

fields.Name: DataSet
fields.Description: Type of data to retrieve (default: 'summary')
Census data retrieved successfully
Either ZipCode or both City and State parameters are required
Invalid ZIP code format. Must be 5 digits
Invalid state name or abbreviation
Location not found or no data available
Failed to retrieve census data

fields.Name: Web Search
fields.Description: Performs web search using DuckDuckGo's search API and returns search results with titles, URLs, and snippets

fields.Name: SearchTerms
fields.Description: Keywords to search for

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10, max: 30)

fields.Name: Region
fields.Description: Regional search preference (default: 'us-en')

fields.Name: SafeSearch
fields.Description: Safe search level - 'strict', 'moderate', 'off' (default: 'moderate')

fields.Name: DisableQueueing
fields.Description: If true, fails immediately when rate limited instead of queueing (default: false)
Search completed successfully
SearchTerms parameter is required
SearchTerms cannot be empty
DuckDuckGo search request failed
No search results found

fields.Name: Web Page Content
fields.Description: Retrieves and processes web page content with various output formats including text extraction, HTML parsing, and document conversion

fields.Name: URL
fields.Description: Web page URL to fetch content from

fields.Name: ContentType
fields.Description: Output format - 'text', 'html', 'markdown', 'json' (default: 'text')

fields.Name: ExtractMainContent
fields.Description: Extract only main content vs full page (default: false)

fields.Name: IncludeMetadata
fields.Description: Include page metadata in response (default: true)

fields.Name: MaxContentLength
fields.Description: Maximum content length to return (default: 50000 chars)
Content retrieved successfully
URL parameter is required
Invalid URL format
ContentType must be one of: text, html, markdown, json
Failed to fetch URL

fields.Name: URL Link Validator
fields.Description: Validates URLs by checking accessibility, response codes, and performing health checks with detailed status information

fields.Name: URL
fields.Description: Single URL to validate (use this OR URLs)

fields.Name: URLs
fields.Description: Array of URLs to validate (use this OR URL)

fields.Name: TimeoutMs
fields.Description: Request timeout in milliseconds (default: 5000, max: 30000)

fields.Name: FollowRedirects
fields.Description: Whether to follow redirects (default: true)

fields.Name: CheckSSL
fields.Description: Whether to check SSL certificate validity (default: true)
URL validation completed successfully
Either URL or URLs parameter is required

fields.Description: Extracts comprehensive metadata from web pages including OpenGraph, Twitter Cards, Schema.org structured data, and standard HTML meta tags

fields.Name: URL
fields.Description: Web page URL to extract metadata from

fields.Name: IncludeOpenGraph
fields.Description: Extract OpenGraph metadata (default: true)

fields.Name: IncludeTwitterCards
fields.Description: Extract Twitter Card metadata (default: true)

fields.Name: IncludeSchemaOrg
fields.Description: Extract Schema.org JSON-LD data (default: true)

fields.Name: IncludeBasicMeta
fields.Description: Extract standard HTML meta tags (default: true)

fields.Name: IncludeFavicon
fields.Description: Extract favicon information (default: true)

fields.Name: QR Code
fields.Description: Generates and reads QR codes with customizable options for size, error correction, and styling

fields.Name: Operation
fields.Description: 'generate' or 'read'

fields.Name: Data
fields.Description: Text/URL to encode (for generate) or base64 image data (for read)

fields.Name: Size
fields.Description: QR code size in pixels (default: 200, max: 1000) [generate only]

fields.Name: ErrorCorrection
fields.Description: Error correction level 'L', 'M', 'Q', 'H' (default: 'M') [generate only]

fields.Name: Margin
fields.Description: Quiet zone margin (default: 4) [generate only]

fields.Name: DarkColor
fields.Description: Dark module color (default: '#000000') [generate only]

fields.Name: LightColor
fields.Description: Light module color (default: '#FFFFFF') [generate only]

fields.Name: Create Record
fields.Description: Generic action for creating new entity records in the database. Accepts entity name and field values as parameters.

fields.Name: EntityName
fields.Description: The name of the entity to create

fields.Name: Fields
fields.Description: Object containing field names and values to set on the new record

fields.Name: PrimaryKey
fields.Description: Object containing the primary key field(s) and their value(s) for the created record.
Record created successfully
Failed to create record
Entity not found in metadata
Validation error occurred
Permission denied to create record

fields.Name: Get Record
fields.Description: Generic action for retrieving entity records from the database. Accepts entity name and primary key values as parameters.

fields.Name: EntityName
fields.Description: The name of the entity to retrieve

fields.Name: PrimaryKey
fields.Description: Object containing primary key field(s) and value(s)

fields.Name: Record
fields.Description: The retrieved entity record data
Record retrieved successfully
Failed to retrieve record
Entity not found in metadata
Record not found
Validation error occurred
Permission denied to access record

fields.Name: Update Record
fields.Description: Generic action for updating existing entity records in the database. Accepts entity name, primary key, and field values as parameters.

fields.Name: EntityName
fields.Description: The name of the entity to update

fields.Name: PrimaryKey
fields.Description: Object containing primary key field(s) and value(s)

fields.Name: Fields
fields.Description: Object containing field names and values to update

fields.Name: UpdatedFields
fields.Description: Object containing the fields that were actually changed with old and new values

fields.Name: EntityName
fields.Description: The name of the entity to delete

fields.Name: PrimaryKey
fields.Description: Object containing primary key field(s) and value(s)

fields.Name: DeletedRecord
fields.Description: The data of the deleted record

fields.Name: Create Agent
fields.Description: Creates a new AI agent with specified configuration. Supports creating both top-level agents and sub-agents. Optionally creates and associates a system prompt if PromptText is provided. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: Name
fields.Description: Name of the new agent

fields.Name: Description
fields.Description: Detailed description of the agent's purpose and capabilities

fields.Name: TypeID
fields.Description: ID of the AI Agent Type. Either Type or TypeID must be provided

fields.Name: Type
fields.Description: Name of the AI Agent Type (e.g., 'Loop'). Either Type or TypeID must be provided

fields.Name: ParentID
fields.Description: ID of the parent agent if this is a sub-agent

fields.Name: PromptText
fields.Description: System prompt text that defines the agent's behavior. If provided, creates and associates a prompt with the agent

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the newly created agent

fields.Name: PromptID
fields.Description: ID of the created prompt (if PromptText was provided)

fields.Name: Update Agent
fields.Description: Updates an existing AI agent's configuration. Optionally updates the agent's prompt text if provided. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent to update

fields.Name: Name
fields.Description: New name for the agent

fields.Name: Description
fields.Description: New description for the agent

fields.Name: PromptText
fields.Description: New system prompt text for the agent. Updates existing prompt or creates new one if none exists

fields.Name: Status
fields.Description: New status (Active, Inactive, etc.)

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: True if update was successful

fields.Name: PromptID
fields.Description: ID of the updated or created prompt (if PromptText was provided)

fields.Name: List Agents
fields.Description: Lists AI agents with optional filtering. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: IncludeInactive
fields.Description: Include inactive agents in results

fields.Name: ParentID
fields.Description: Filter by parent agent ID

fields.Name: TypeID
fields.Description: Filter by agent type ID

fields.Name: Agents
fields.Description: Array of agent objects

fields.Name: Deactivate Agent
fields.Description: Marks an agent as inactive (soft delete). Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent to deactivate

fields.Name: Reason
fields.Description: Reason for deactivation

fields.Name: Success
fields.Description: True if deactivation was successful

fields.Name: Associate Action With Agent
fields.Description: Associates an action with an agent. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent

fields.Name: ActionID
fields.Description: ID of the action to associate

fields.Name: Status
fields.Description: Status of the association (Active/Inactive)

fields.Name: AgentActionID
fields.Description: ID of the created agent-action association

fields.Name: Create Sub Agent
fields.Description: Creates a new agent as a child of another agent. Optionally creates and associates a system prompt if PromptText is provided. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: ParentAgentID
fields.Description: ID of the parent agent

fields.Name: Name
fields.Description: Name of the sub-agent

fields.Name: Description
fields.Description: Description of the sub-agent

fields.Name: TypeID
fields.Description: ID of the AI Agent Type. Either Type or TypeID must be provided

fields.Name: Type
fields.Description: Name of the AI Agent Type (e.g., 'Loop'). Either Type or TypeID must be provided

fields.Name: PromptText
fields.Description: System prompt text that defines the sub-agent's behavior. If provided, creates and associates a prompt with the agent

fields.Name: ExecutionOrder
fields.Description: Execution order among sibling agents

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the newly created sub-agent

fields.Name: PromptID
fields.Description: ID of the created prompt (if PromptText was provided)

fields.Name: Set Agent Prompt
fields.Description: Associates or updates a prompt for an agent. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent

fields.Name: PromptID
fields.Description: ID of the prompt to associate

fields.Name: ExecutionOrder
fields.Description: Order of prompt execution

fields.Name: Status
fields.Description: Status of the prompt association

fields.Name: AssociationID
fields.Description: ID of the prompt association

fields.Name: Validate Agent Configuration
fields.Description: Validates that an agent has all required prompts and actions configured. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent to validate

fields.Name: IsValid
fields.Description: True if agent configuration is valid

fields.Name: ValidationErrors
fields.Description: Array of validation error messages

fields.Name: Export Agent Bundle
fields.Description: Exports an agent with all sub-agents and configurations as metadata. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent to export

fields.Name: IncludeSubAgents
fields.Description: Include all sub-agents in export

fields.Name: IncludePrompts
fields.Description: Include associated prompts

fields.Name: IncludeActions
fields.Description: Include associated actions

fields.Name: Bundle
fields.Description: Exported agent bundle as JSON

fields.Name: List Actions
fields.Description: Lists available actions that can be associated with agents. Used by Planning Designer Agent.

fields.Name: CategoryID
fields.Description: Filter by action category ID

fields.Name: ExcludeAgentManagement
fields.Description: Exclude agent management actions from results

fields.Name: Actions
fields.Description: Array of available actions

fields.Name: Get Agent Details
fields.Description: Gets detailed information about a specific agent including its full hierarchy (sub-agents, sub-sub-agents, etc.) and associated actions at each level. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: AgentID
fields.Description: ID of the agent to get details for

fields.Name: IncludePrompts
fields.Description: Whether to include prompt details in the response

fields.Name: AgentDetails
fields.Description: Full agent details including hierarchy and actions

fields.Name: Get Action Details
fields.Description: Gets detailed information about a specific action including all metadata, parameters, and result codes. Restricted to Agent Manager agent only.

fields.Name: ActionID
fields.Description: ID of the action to get details for

fields.Name: ActionDetails
fields.Description: Full action details including parameters and result codes
